coreAttributes.clothingAuthorTag: Small engraved lettering informs you that these pins were made by 'Norin'.
coreAttributes.name: hair pin
coreAttributes.description: A couple of hair pins used to help tame unruly hair.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(remove)] some hair pins from [npc.her] [npc.hairSkin+], letting it flow free.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(remove)] some hair pins from [npc2.NamePos] [npc2.hairSkin+], letting it flow free.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(gather)] [npc.her] [npc.hairSkin+] and [npc.verb(slide)] in some hair pins to keep in in place.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(gather)] [npc2.NamePos] [npc2.hairSkin+] and [npc.verb(slide)] in some hair pins to keep in in place.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(gather)] [npc2.NamePos] [npc2.hairSkin+] and [npc.verb(force)] in some hair pins.
